item.title: A Day in the Life of an Azure FinOps Practitioner
item.description:
Every day in Azure FinOps feels like navigating a massive, ever-evolving financial control tower in the cloud. My mornings usually start with dashboardsâ€”lots of dashboards. I check daily cost trends, unusual spikes, and usage anomalies across subscriptions and resource groups. It’s like being a financial detective with access to telemetry and APIs.

Next comes tagging hygiene and resource governance. Are our cost allocation tags consistent? Have new untagged resources appeared overnight? If yes, it’s time to engage with resource owners or automate fixes. Clean data is the foundation of good decisions.
